VPEArchocaster.PsycasterPath_ExtraCondit.label: archocaster
VPEArchocaster.PsycasterPath_ExtraCondit.description: Secret pathway for those who seek solely the utmost power, twisted mind of archocasters is capable of applying unthinkable control over those beneath it.
VPEArchocaster.PsycasterPath_ExtraCondit.tooltip: Psychic exploration leads to a mysterious path, where one encounters arcane challenges and gains control over formidable psychic phenomenons.
